Helping Kids with Cancer Smile

About Us

The Sunshine Kids Foundation provides exciting, positive group activities and opportunites for children with cancer so they may once again do what kids are meant to do... have fun and celebrate life. We provide exciting, positive group activites and opportunities

Our Programs

National Trips
National trips are week-long trips provided throughout the year for teenage cancer patients from hospitals across the United States and Canada.
Local Activities
Local activities are provided across the United States for Sunshine Kids of all ages and their families and include a variety of exciting opportunities
Hospital Programs
Our in-hospital programs bring sunshine and smiles to children with cancer inside the hospital environment to help brighten the day

Testimonials

Thanks so much for lighting up the lives of cancer patients and their families! Sunshine Kid Mom
Houston, TX

News Coverage
